text:
When I tried to upgrade my Apache server (Win32) from 2.0.35 to 2.0.39 the 
module wouldn't load and I get the following message

apache : module "mod_jrun20.c" is not compatible with this version of Apache.
Please contact the vendor for the correct version.

Best Rgds, Ergin
creator: ergin@ergin.net
ergin@ergin.net
text:
I am running Coldfusion MX as application server and that's why I need module 
mod_jrun20.so ;-)

As the message in the error log said, you need to contact the vendor of the 
module.

(You may be interested in this URL: 
http://webforums.macromedia.com/coldfusion/messageview.cfm?
catid=143&threadid=375346
)

Thanks for using Apache.
creator: trawick@apache.org
